product.title: Micro Japanese Sakura Cherry Tree Music Box Building Sets
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • This beautiful Japanese Sakura Cherry Tree Music Box will inspire your romantic memories of Japan

    The cherry blossom is Japan's official flower, symbolizing the beauty of life and the impermanence of all things. This music box captures the elegance and grace of the tree in sakura blossoms that adorn its cover. With 806 micro pieces, this music box is crafted to emulate a flowering cherry tree to bring you a piece of alluring Japan into your home.

    🌸 Measurements: 6x6x6in / 16.5x14.5x14.5cm
    🌸 Not compatible with leading blocks of standard size (16mm) 
    🌸 This is Micro blocks (12mm)
    🌸 Each set has over 806 micro pieces
    🌸 Includes windup mechanical music box
    📦 Excludes original box to protect the environment. For further details please see below.*

    A uniquely romantic gift that won't fail to surprise and remind the one you love that you're there, anytime


    Our micro blocks are designed for everyone with easy to follow building instructions for easy assembly. What are you waiting for? Start building your collection now!

    Micro Blocks: Smaller than the traditional building block.

    The high-quality mechanical windup music box is already built and housed in with the advanced building blocks, but you can still have a fun and exciting time decorating around it with building blocks.



    Our building blocks are designed with advanced engineering features and challenging task for all fans of challenging built, and still achievable to complete by following the instruction booklet.

    The perfect gift for those who love their crafts!

    You will love seeing your family and friends in excitement when they receive our building blocks, leaving an everlasting smile on your loved ones by surprising them with this super innovative and cool building blocks today.

    * Our Building Block sets are packaged in safe and secured protective bags. They do NOT come in the original box to reduce the carbon footprint, save the planet and reduce postage cost on your behalf. It will come with all the pieces and a detailed instruction booklet for you to follow along. 



    Features

    🎵 100% premium quality (ABS) plastic
    🍊 Sharp brilliant colors and solid feel
    🎵 Challenging and rewarding to stimulate all brains
    🍊 High-quality durable non-toxic green material

    WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD - Contain small parts; not suitable for children under 6 years old unless there is adult supervision.


  • Where do we ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

    What are the blocks made from? All our building blocks are manufactured from a High-Quality Premium strong, resilient plastic known as acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) and will stand the test of time and provide hours of fun building their own creations

    Does this help with stress and development?     Our building blocks is a great way to relieve stress and engage in meaningful and joyful conversations. As children comment on their building creations, they develop important communication skills including the ability to explain ideas, describe their work, talk about the process and verbalize challenges that they had along the way. 

    CHOKING HAZARD: Small parts. Not for children under 6 years old

     

  • We are proud to offer FREE tracked shipping to over 300 countries worldwide including the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many others. If you are wondering if we ship to your country please head over to our Shipping Policy.

    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: Est 5-30 Business days
